view.name: AdminView
view.sql: create view AdminView as select * from Admin

view.name: Labels
view.sql: CREATE VIEW labels AS select a.OC_LABEL_TYPE AS labeltype, a.OC_LABEL_ID AS labelid, a.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelnl, b.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelfr, c.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelen from @openclinic@.dbo.oc_labels a join @openclinic@.dbo.oc_labels b on (a.OC_LABEL_TYPE = b.OC_LABEL_TYPE) join @openclinic@.dbo.oc_labels c on (a.OC_LABEL_TYPE = c.OC_LABEL_TYPE) where (a.OC_LABEL_ID = b.OC_LABEL_ID) and (a.OC_LABEL_ID = c.OC_LABEL_ID) and (a.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'nl') and (b.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'fr') and (c.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'en')

CREATE VIEW labels AS select a.OC_LABEL_TYPE AS labeltype, a.OC_LABEL_ID AS labelid, a.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelnl, b.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelfr, c.OC_LABEL_VALUE AS labelen from ((@openclinic@.oc_labels a join @openclinic@.oc_labels b) join @openclinic@.oc_labels c) where (a.OC_LABEL_TYPE = b.OC_LABEL_TYPE) and (a.OC_LABEL_TYPE = c.OC_LABEL_TYPE) and (a.OC_LABEL_ID = b.OC_LABEL_ID) and (a.OC_LABEL_ID = c.OC_LABEL_ID) and (a.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'nl') and (b.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'fr') and (c.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE = 'en')

view.name: FunctionsView
view.sql: create view FunctionsView as select workid,functionid,functiontype,labeltype,labelid,labelnl,labelfr,labelen from AdminFunctions,Labels where Labels.labeltype='Function' and Labels.labelid = AdminFunctions.functionid and AdminFunctions.deletetime is null

view.name: PrivateView
view.sql: create view PrivateView as select privateid,personid,start,stop,AdminPrivate.comment privatecomment,address,city,zipcode,country,telephone,fax,email,mobile from AdminPrivate

view.name: ServicesView
view.sql: create view ServicesView as select workid,serviceid,servicetype,l.OC_LABEL_TYPE,l.OC_LABEL_ID,l.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE,l.OC_LABEL_VALUE from AdminServices,openclinic.dbo.OC_LABELS l where (l.OC_LABEL_TYPE = 'Service' OR l.OC_LABEL_TYPE = 'service') and l.OC_LABEL_ID = AdminServices.serviceid

create view ServicesView as select workid,serviceid,servicetype,l.OC_LABEL_TYPE,l.OC_LABEL_ID,l.OC_LABEL_LANGUAGE,l.OC_LABEL_VALUE from AdminServices,openclinic_dbo.OC_LABELS l where (l.OC_LABEL_TYPE = 'Service' OR l.OC_LABEL_TYPE = 'service') and l.OC_LABEL_ID = AdminServices.serviceid

view.name: OC_INVOICES_COUNTERVIEW
view.sql: create view OC_INVOICES_COUNTERVIEW as select OC_PATIENTINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_PATIENTINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_INSURARINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_EXTRAINSURARINVOICES

create view OC_INVOICES_COUNTERVIEW as select OC_PATIENTINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_PATIENTINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_INSURARINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_EXTRAINSURARINVOICES

create view OC_INVOICES_COUNTERVIEW as select OC_PATIENTINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_PATIENTINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_INSURARINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_EXTRAINSURARINVOICES

create view OC_INVOICES_COUNTERVIEW as select OC_PATIENTINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_PATIENTINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_INSURARINVOICES union select OC_INSURARINVOICE_OBJECTID as OC_INVOICE_OBJECTID from OC_EXTRAINSURARINVOICES

view.name: LastConvocation
view.sql: create view LastConvocation as select personId personid,max(convert(datetime,c.value,103)) lastconvocation from Transactions a, Healthrecord b, Items c where a.healthRecordId=b.healthRecordId and a.transactionId=c.transactionId and a.serverid=c.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and c.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_MER_EXAMINATION_DATE' group by personId

create view LastConvocation as select personId personid,max(cast(substring(c.value,7,4)||'/'||substring(c.value,4,2)||'/'||substring(c.value,1,2) as datetime)) lastconvocation from Transactions a, Healthrecord b, Items c where a.healthRecordId=b.healthRecordId and a.transactionId=c.transactionId and a.serverid=c.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and c.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_MER_EXAMINATION_DATE' group by personId

view.name: LastDrivingCertificate
view.sql: create view LastDrivingCertificate as select personId personid,max(updateTime) lastconvocation from Transactions a, Healthrecord b where a.healthRecordId=b.healthRecordId and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_DLC' group by personId

view.name: MERs
view.sql: create view MERs as select distinct a.personId,c.value examinationDate,d.value convocationDate from Healthrecord a,Transactions b,Items c,Items d where a.healthRecordId=b.healthRecordId and b.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and b.transactionId=c.transactionId and b.serverid=c.serverid and b.transactionId=d.transactionId and b.serverid=d.serverid and c.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_MER_EXAMINATION_DATE' and d.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_MER_NEW_CONVOCATION_DATE'

view.name: MERView
view.sql: create view MERView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a with(index(transactions_healthrecordid)),Items b with(index(items_transactionid)) where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers','context.context.drivers-licence','context.context.periodic-examinations','context.context.previous-to-work')

create view MERView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a ,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers','context.context.drivers-licence','context.context.periodic-examinations','context.context.previous-to-work')

create view MERView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a ,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_MER' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers','context.context.drivers-licence','context.context.periodic-examinations','context.context.previous-to-work')

view.name: OPHTALMOLOGYView
view.sql: create view OPHTALMOLOGYView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a with(index(transactions_healthrecordid)),Items b with(index(items_transactionid)) where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_OPHTALMOLOGY' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers')

create view OPHTALMOLOGYView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a ,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_OPHTALMOLOGY' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers')

create view OPHTALMOLOGYView as select a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a ,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and a.transactionType='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_OPHTALMOLOGY' and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT' and b.value in ('context.context.screenworkers')

view.name: ServicesAddressView
view.sql: create view ServicesAddressView as SELECT convert(int,zipcode) zip, * FROM @admin@..Services

create view ServicesAddressView as SELECT convert('0'||zipcode,signed) as zip, serviceid,address,city,zipcode,country,telephone,fax,comment,updatetime,email,parentid, serviceparentid,inscode,serviceorder,servicelanguage,updateuserid,parentserviceid,code1,code2,code3,code4,code5,contract,contracttype, contactperson,contractdate,portal_email,contactaddress,contactzipcode,contactcity,contactcountry,contacttelephone,contactfax,contactemail, ssn,code6,defaultcontext,defaultservicestockuid,wicket,totalbeds,inactive FROM @admin@.Services
create view ServicesAddressView as SELECT convert(int,zipcode) zip, * FROM admin..Services
create view ServicesAddressView as SELECT convert(int,zipcode) zip, * FROM Services

view.name: OC_DIAGNOSES_VIEW
view.sql: create view OC_DIAGNOSES_VIEW as select a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_DATE, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_ENCOUNTERUID, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_AUTHORUID, b.OC_DIAGNOSIS_GROUPCODE as OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODETYPE, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CERTAINTY, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_GRAVITY, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_ENDDATE, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_POA, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_NC, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_SERVICEUID, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_ENCOUNTEROBJECTID, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_SERVERID, a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_OBJECTID from OC_DIAGNOSES a,OC_DIAGNOSIS_GROUPS b where a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODE>=b.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODESTART and a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODE<=b.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODEEND and a.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODETYPE=b.OC_DIAGNOSIS_CODETYPE

view.name: TransactionView
view.sql: create view TransactionView as select b.value,a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a with(index(transactions_updatetime)),Items b with(index(items_transactionid)) where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT'

create view TransactionView as select b.value,a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT'

create view TransactionView as select b.value,a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT'

create view TransactionView as select b."value",a.userId,a.healthRecordId,a.transactionId,a.serverid,a.transactionType,a.updateTime,a.ts from Transactions a,Items b where a.transactionId=b.transactionId and a.serverid=b.serverid and b.type='be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.ITEM_TYPE_CONTEXT_CONTEXT'

view.name: OC_ENCOUNTERS_VIEW
view.sql:
create view oc_encounters_view as select a.oc_encounter_serverid, a.oc_encounter_objectid, a.oc_encounter_type, b.oc_encounter_servicebegindate as OC_ENCOUNTER_BEGINDATE, b.oc_encounter_serviceenddate as OC_ENCOUNTER_ENDDATE, a.oc_encounter_patientuid, a.oc_encounter_createtime, a.oc_encounter_updatetime, a.oc_encounter_updateuid, a.oc_encounter_version, a.oc_encounter_outcome, a.oc_encounter_destinationuid, a.oc_encounter_origin, a.oc_encounter_situation, b.oc_encounter_serviceuid, b.oc_encounter_beduid, b.oc_encounter_manageruid, a.oc_encounter_categories from oc_encounters a,oc_encounter_services b where a.oc_encounter_serverid=b.oc_encounter_serverid and a.oc_encounter_objectid=b.oc_encounter_objectid and b.oc_encounter_serviceenddate is not null
union
select a.oc_encounter_serverid, a.oc_encounter_objectid, a.oc_encounter_type, b.oc_encounter_servicebegindate as OC_ENCOUNTER_BEGINDATE, getdate() as OC_ENCOUNTER_ENDDATE, a.oc_encounter_patientuid, a.oc_encounter_createtime, a.oc_encounter_updatetime, a.oc_encounter_updateuid, a.oc_encounter_version, a.oc_encounter_outcome, a.oc_encounter_destinationuid, a.oc_encounter_origin, a.oc_encounter_situation, b.oc_encounter_serviceuid, b.oc_encounter_beduid, b.oc_encounter_manageruid, a.oc_encounter_categories from oc_encounters a,oc_encounter_services b where a.oc_encounter_serverid=b.oc_encounter_serverid and a.oc_encounter_objectid=b.oc_encounter_objectid and b.oc_encounter_serviceenddate is null and a.oc_encounter_enddate is null

create view oc_encounters_view as select a.oc_encounter_serverid, a.oc_encounter_objectid, a.oc_encounter_type, b.oc_encounter_servicebegindate as OC_ENCOUNTER_BEGINDATE, ifnull(b.oc_encounter_serviceenddate,now()) as OC_ENCOUNTER_ENDDATE, a.oc_encounter_patientuid, a.oc_encounter_createtime, a.oc_encounter_updatetime, a.oc_encounter_updateuid, a.oc_encounter_version, a.oc_encounter_outcome, a.oc_encounter_destinationuid, a.oc_encounter_origin, a.oc_encounter_situation, b.oc_encounter_serviceuid, b.oc_encounter_beduid, b.oc_encounter_manageruid, a.oc_encounter_categories from oc_encounters a,oc_encounter_services b where a.oc_encounter_serverid=b.oc_encounter_serverid and a.oc_encounter_objectid=b.oc_encounter_objectid

proc.name: hasRisk
proc.sql: create proc hasRisk (@personid int, @riskcode varchar(255),@result char(1) output) as begin declare cpHR CURSOR for select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,FunctionCategoryRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.FUNCTION_CATEGORY' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.functionCategoryId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,WorkplaceRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.WORKPLACE' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.workplaceId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileItems b,RiskCodes c where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid open cpHR fetch cpHR into @personid if (@@FETCH_STATUS=0) select @result='Y' else select @result='N' close cpHR end

create proc hasRisk (@personid int, @riskcode varchar(255),@result char(1) output) as begin declare cpHR CURSOR for select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,FunctionCategoryRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.FUNCTION_CATEGORY' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.functionCategoryId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,WorkplaceRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.WORKPLACE' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.workplaceId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileItems b,RiskCodes c where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid open cpHR fetch cpHR into @personid if (@@sqlstatus=0) select @result='Y' else select @result='N' close cpHR end

create proc hasRisk (@personid int, @riskcode varchar(255),@result char(1) output) as begin declare cpHR CURSOR for select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,FunctionCategoryRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.FUNCTION_CATEGORY' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.functionCategoryId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileContexts b,WorkplaceRisks c,RiskCodes d where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.WORKPLACE' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.workplaceId and c.riskId=d.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid union select a.personId personid from RiskProfiles a,RiskProfileItems b,RiskCodes c where a.profileId=b.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and a.dateEnd=null and b.itemId=c.id and code like @riskcode+'%' and personId=@personid open cpHR fetch cpHR into @personid if (@@sqlstatus=0) select @result='Y' else select @result='N' close cpHR end

proc.name: vaccinationCard
proc.sql: create proc vaccinationCard(@personId int) as select c.messageKey from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileItems b, Examinations c where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId = a.profileId and b.status>0 and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_EXAMINATION' and b.itemId=c.id and c.transactionType like 'be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_VACCINATION%' and personId=@personId union select c.messageKey from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileItems b, Examinations c, RiskExaminations d where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId = a.profileId and b.status>0 and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and b.itemId=d.riskId and d.examinationId=c.id and c.transactionType like 'be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_VACCINATION%' and personId=@personId union select c.messageKey from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileContexts b, Examinations c, RiskExaminations d, FunctionCategoryRisks e where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId = a.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.FUNCTION_CATEGORY' and b.itemId=e.functionCategoryId and d.riskId=e.riskId and d.examinationId=c.id and c.transactionType like 'be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_VACCINATION%' and e.riskId not in ( select itemId from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileItems b where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId=a.profileId and b.status<0 and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and a.personId=@personId ) and personId=@personId union select c.messageKey from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileContexts b, Examinations c, RiskExaminations d, WorkplaceRisks e where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId = a.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.WORKPLACE' and b.itemId=e.workplaceId and d.riskId=e.riskId and d.examinationId=c.id and c.transactionType like 'be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_VACCINATION%' and e.riskId not in ( select itemId from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileItems b where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId=a.profileId and b.status<0 and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_RISK' and a.personId=@personId ) and personId=@personId union select c.messageKey from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileContexts b, Examinations c, FunctionGroupExaminations d where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId = a.profileId and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.FUNCTION_GROUP' and b.itemId=d.functionGroupId and d.examinationId=c.id and c.transactionType like 'be.mxs.common.model.vo.healthrecord.IConstants.TRANSACTION_TYPE_VACCINATION%' and c.id not in ( select itemId from RiskProfiles a, RiskProfileItems b where a.dateEnd is null and b.profileId=a.profileId and b.status<0 and b.itemType='be.dpms.medwan.common.model.IConstants.PERSONAL_EXAMINATION' and a.personId=@personId ) and personId=@personId

exec.sql: ALTER TABLE oc_patientcredits ALTER COLUMN OC_PATIENTCREDIT_INVOICEUID VARCHAR(25)
ALTER TABLE oc_patientcredits MODIFY COLUMN OC_PATIENTCREDIT_INVOICEUID VARCHAR(25)
alter table admin alter column natreg varchar(50)
alter table admin modify natreg varchar(50)
